title: +++ Three bedrooms, 2 baths total, this apartment  for rent+++
posting_body: ['New boutique apartment in the Woodbridge neighborhood, this is one of three in this fully-renovated Dutch colonial structure.', 'Three bedrooms, 2 baths total, this home has a bi-level layout, with a spacious suite on the upper level.', 'The main level has separate living, formal dining and an open kitchen, one + half baths, a bedroom, and laundry; Flat panel cabinets, granite countertops, subway tile, brand new solid oak floors, new wood windows, freestanding tub - this space was designed to be modern, yet complement the historic features; There is also a very large shared basement, a small private terrace, and parking for one vehicle in the secure carport.', '❦════•⊰❂𝐈𝐟 𝐲𝐨𝐮 𝐚𝐫𝐞 𝐢𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐝, Please Text me::- (716) 229-06^81\u202c \u202c ❂⊱•════❦', 'Unique property.', 'Rent Main house only $700.', 'Or rent Main house plus studio and 2 car garage $700.', 'Charming mid century brick home on a corner lot.', '2 bed 1.5 bath main home.', 'Formal dining room, family room, with fireplace, and large room off the kitchen with built in storage.', 'Central heat and air conditioning.', 'Fenced yard Covered parking.', 'Pets negotiable with additional non refundable 150 fee per pet.', 'No guard dog breeds per insurance.', 'Application back ground and credit check required for all occupants over 18.', 'Non smoking.', 'Detached studio apartment available for increased rent fee.', '$2000 for both house and studio.', 'Deposit $1000 if renting both.', 'Shown by appointment only.']
